thread.section_title: Amba Hotel Charing Cross - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location, Location, Location!
thread.title_full: Location, Location, Location! - Review of Amba Hotel Charing Cross, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: NerysCH1
title: Location, Location, Location!
text: What a lovely Hotel, I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone who visits London, the location was fantastic ... the staff were so friendly and helpful. We had a free upgrade and had a lovely Executive King Room .. if was very nice with a sofa and char and very large bed. We will definitely be returning.
